name: Angular-priceconvertor
tagline: Here i have uploaded my angularJs project on price convertor based on Exchange currency
body:
It is a AngularJs price converter based on Currency Exchange Rate.

Technology used : AngularJs, HTML5.

Screenshots 1 :

Price of the product is $200 in USD

![product price in USD](https://i2.wp.com/suchitradesigner.files.wordpress.com/2015/11/screenshot-localhost-2015-11-23-09-23-48.png?w=450)

Screenshots 2 :

Price of the product can be converted to INR. Based on the quantity,

![product price based on INR](https://i1.wp.com/suchitradesigner.files.wordpress.com/2015/11/screenshot-localhost-2015-11-23-09-39-15.png)


Thanks for your support
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
